name: Horse Riding Derby Free | Wild Horses Games For Girls
name_original: Horse Riding Derby Free | Wild Horses Games For Girls
description:
Hey, Cowboy! In the South of Red River a big fortune awaits you! But it will not be easy to get there. A herd of buffaloes and wild horses will get in your way.

Become a real cowboy
Saddle up your horse, adjust your spurs and immerse yourself in this amazing race, in which angry buffaloes will try to make you fall off your horse.

Realistic horses
Choose your horse, take the reins, and test your reflexes in this original game. The fantastic graphics inspired in the Wild West will make you feel like a sarsaparilla, but do not get distracted, you have a mission!

Enjoy the Wild West!
How long can you survive without end under the feet of the buffalo? Run, dodge and fly on the back of your horse.
Unleash your wild side in the best race horse of the moment!

Twitter: @Oscarminigames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
